title: Snail statue
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| snail statue 8 [![Snail statue.png](/images/d/d3/Snail_statue.png)](/File:Snail_statue.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                       |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Snail statues** are [statues](/Statue "Statue") featured in certain [Cheibriados](/Cheibriados "Cheibriados") [altar](/Altar "Altar") [vaults](/Vault "Vault"). They have no offensive capabilities, but magically create patches of mud around themselves that slows all movement to a crawl.

## Spells

| Spell set |                                                                     |
| :-------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Leda's Liquefaction](/Leda%27s_Liquefaction "Leda's Liquefaction") |
| Slot2     | [Leda's Liquefaction](/Leda%27s_Liquefaction "Leda's Liquefaction") |
| Slot3     | [Leda's Liquefaction](/Leda%27s_Liquefaction "Leda's Liquefaction") |
| Slot4     | [Leda's Liquefaction](/Leda%27s_Liquefaction "Leda's Liquefaction") |
| Slot5     | [Leda's Liquefaction](/Leda%27s_Liquefaction "Leda's Liquefaction") |
| Slot6     | [Leda's Liquefaction](/Leda%27s_Liquefaction "Leda's Liquefaction") |

## Tips & Tricks

- So long as you face them alone, they're essentially free [experience](/Experience "Experience").

## History

Removed in [0.13](/0.13 "0.13").
html:
Snail statue

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
snail statue 8 
HP 70
HD 1
XP 10
Speed 10
AC 12
EV 1
Will Immune



Resistances rPois+, rF+, rC+, rElec, rTorm, rN+, rRot
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat land
Intelligence High
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Non-living
Size Large
Type statue, statue
Flags Stationary
Speaks
No poly
This idol to the god Cheibriados has the odd property of turning the ground in its presence into difficult-to-slog-through mud.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Snail statues are statues featured in certain Cheibriados altar vaults. They have no offensive capabilities, but magically create patches of mud around themselves that slows all movement to a crawl.

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 Leda's Liquefaction
Slot2 Leda's Liquefaction
Slot3 Leda's Liquefaction
Slot4 Leda's Liquefaction
Slot5 Leda's Liquefaction
Slot6 Leda's Liquefaction

Tips & Tricks

  • So long as you face them alone, they're essentially free experience.

History

Removed in 0.13.
